sub_topic: Preparation of 2,4-dichlorobenzoic acid from benzoic acid and chlorine gas
message_1: What is the optimum reaction conditions (temperature, pressure, and duration of the reaction) for the synthesis of 2,4-dichlorobenzoic acid from benzoic acid and chlorine gas to achieve the highest yield with the least amount of side products?
